name: [Group06]Trash Travellers
description:
STUMBLE AS FAST AS YOU CAN!

Outrun your friends and play as a memorable cast of demented characters in a high-speed, crazy obstacle race across a set of wacky household furniture. 

Avoid traps, collect funky pickups, and shoot your enemies down as you make your way towards your final destination: an actual trash.

Fast-paced gameplay, questionable background music, and more all await you in this edition of Trash Travellers!
